# infinity

**Type Property**

Positive infinity.

## Declaration

```swift
static var infinity: Float80 { get }
```

## Discussion

Infinity compares greater than all finite numbers and equal to other infinite values.

```swift
let x = Double.greatestFiniteMagnitude
let y = x * 2
// y == Double.infinity
// y > x
```
title: infinity
